Docs.summary: You can use the BufferManager class to manage a buffer pool. The pool is created when you instantiate this class . Buffer is instantiated when there are no unused buffers in the pool. Destroyed when the buffer pool is reclaimed by garbage collection. Every time you need to use a buffer, you take one from the pool, use it, and return it to the pool when done. This process is much faster than creating and destroying a buffer every time you need to use one.
